name: RunBot - Real Parkour Runner Game
description:
The best sci-fi parkour & endless free running games is out! Join 10 million players and help RunBot the runner robot to escape from droid cops in a dangerous and futuristic city! Rush, dash, sprint, swing, fly with your jetpack, slide to dodge obstacles, kill enemies, run and jump to survive in one of the best running parkour games!

You are a robotic and powerful weapon created by evil enemy forces. Break free and escape in an endless running to save your own life. Run and dodge in this parkour simulator! Race and runaway to survive

If you love scifi (science fiction), robots and runner games, you will enjoy this epic and funny endless free parkour simulator with stunning 3D graphics and amazing environments and levels! Prepare to run in one of the best free running games.

★ Download RunBot - Real Parkour Runner Game for FREE and start playing online or offline! ★


FEATURES

BEST ENDLESS RUNNER GAMES + PARKOUR GAMES
Race, jump, sprint, climb, dodge and dash! Run as far as you can avoiding obstacles and enemies. Slide and use your real parkour skills.

CHALLENGING ARCADE GAMEPLAY
Fly with your jetpack, play in night mode, jump obstacles, use first person vision, get infinite coins and powerups, beat records and challenge your friends!

STUNNING 3D GRAPHICS
Run with your runner robot in a high detailed futuristic and sci-fi city full of cops and cyborgs. The best 3D graphics in free running games!

FUN AND ADRENALINE
Rush & run over the buildings rooftops, dodge flying cars and laser walls, avoid futuristic obstacles and get fun in this adventure for free running games fans!

UPGRADE YOUR RUNNER ROBOT
Get hundred of coins and improve your cyborg. Level up to obtain resistance, velocity, magnet power and a better jetpack in this parkour simulator.

FREE RUNNING GAMES OFFLINE AND ONLINE
No wifi or internet connection? You can play this parkour runner game online or offline! Worry about running and jumping in this epic adventure full of adrenaline!


This is what press writes about RunBot, one of the best free running games!

★ "Stunning in 3D graphics." - Touch Arcade

★ "Addictive and changing, RunBot is great for quick bursts of fun..." - MacLife

★ "If you’re a fan of infinite runner games… then you will want to check out RunBot." - AppAdvice


Are you the fastest runner robot? Break free and start running for your life in the ultimate real parkour game for lovers of sci-fi adventures and arcade games.

RunBot is a 3D endless running game with parkour games and futuristic and sci-fi ambiance. Your goal is to run freely as far as you can and obtain coins and rewards. Level up your runner robot, improve your lethal weapons and start running, rushing and jumping to escape from cops in an infinite chase.

Enjoy top 1 new running games for free and play online or offline now!
